Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.34344868]Virus:SARS-CoV-2:inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 S protein-mediated cell-cell fusion(IC50=2.1±0.5 nM);inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 pseudovirus infection in 293T/ACE2 cells(IC50=21 nM);inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=23.5 nM);SARS-CoV-2 D614G:inhibition of S protein-mediated cell-cell fusion(IC50=1.3±0.1 nM);inhibition of pseudovirus infection in 293T/ACE2 cells(IC50=98.8 nM);inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=27.5 nM);SARS-CoV:inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=65.9±13.2 nM);MERS-CoV:inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=68.4±9.7 nM);HCoV-NL63:inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=70.8±8.7 nM);HCoV-229E:inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=1128.4±148.6 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.34344868]No significant cytotoxicity in both 293T/ACE2 and Huh-7 cells at a concentration of 10 μM.
Sequence Information.Comments: The peptide is a fusion inhibitor against SARS-CoV-2.

Literature.Title: SARS-CoV-2-derived fusion inhibitor lipopeptides exhibit highly potent and broad-spectrum activity against divergent human coronaviruses.
Literature.Author: Zhu Y, Yu D, Hu Y, Wu T, Chong H, He Y.
